languages.text: {n}Глаза Ирлиэт расширяются то ли от гнева, то ли от ужаса.{/n} "Разве Путь Воина учит жертвовать бесчисленным множеством жизней ради достижения цели? Дети Азуриана — не палачи миров, не убийцы невинных".

traits.locale_text: {n}Глаза Ирлиэт расширяются то ли от гнева, то ли от ужаса.{/n} "Разве Путь Война учит жертвовать бесчисленным множеством жизней ради достижения цели? Дети Азуриана — не палачи миров, не убийцы невинных".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet's eyes grow wide with anger and dismay.{/n} "Does the Path of the Warrior teach you to sacrifice countless lives to achieve your goals? The Children of Asuryan are not the executioners of worlds, nor slayers of the innocent."
languages.original_text: {n}Глаза Ирлиэт расширяются то ли от гнева, то ли от ужаса.{/n} "Разве Путь Воина учит жертвовать бесчисленным множеством жизней ради достижения цели? Дети Азуриана — не палачи миров, не убийцы невинных".

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes grow wide with anger and dismay.{/n}"Does the Path of the Warrior teach to sacrifice countless lives to achieve your goals? The Children of Asuryan do not reave the defenceless worlds, nor do they slay the innocent."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet abre los ojos como platos, furiosa y consternada.{/n}«¿Acaso la Senda del Guerrero te enseña que has de sacrificar innumerables vidas para alcanzar tus objetivos? Los hijos de Asuryan no son verdugos de mundos ni asesinos de inocentes».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes grow wide with anger and dismay.{/n} "Does the Path of the Warrior teach you to sacrifice countless lives to achieve your goals? The Children of Asuryan are not the executioners of worlds, nor slayers of the innocent."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet abre los ojos como platos, furiosa y consternada.{/n}«¿Acaso la Senda del Guerrero te enseña que has de sacrificar innumerables vidas para alcanzar tus objetivos? Los hijos de Asuryan no son verdugos de mundos ni asesinos de inocentes».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特瞪大了眼睛，目光中充满了愤怒和沮丧。{/n}“难道你踏上战士道途，就是为了牺牲无数生命来实现你的目标吗？阿苏焉之子不是毁灭世界的刽子手，更不是屠戮无辜之人的凶手。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes grow wide with anger and dismay.{/n} "Does the Path of the Warrior teach you to sacrifice countless lives to achieve your goals? The Children of Asuryan are not the executioners of worlds, nor slayers of the innocent."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特瞪大了眼睛，目光中充满了愤怒和沮丧。{/n}“难道你踏上战士道途，就是为了牺牲无数生命来实现你的目标吗？阿苏焉之子不是毁灭世界的刽子手，更不是屠戮无辜之人的凶手。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet écarquille les yeux de colère et de consternation.{/n}« La Voie du Guerrier vous apprend-elle à sacrifier d'innombrables vies pour atteindre vos objectifs ? Les enfants d'Asuryan ne sont pas des bourreaux de mondes ni des tueurs d'innocents. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes grow wide with anger and dismay.{/n} "Does the Path of the Warrior teach you to sacrifice countless lives to achieve your goals? The Children of Asuryan are not the executioners of worlds, nor slayers of the innocent."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet écarquille les yeux de colère et de consternation.{/n}« La Voie du Guerrier vous apprend-elle à sacrifier d'innombrables vies pour atteindre vos objectifs ? Les enfants d'Asuryan ne sont pas des bourreaux de mondes ni des tueurs d'innocents. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは、怒りと落胆で目を見開く。{/n}「戦士の道は、目的を達成するために無数の命を犠牲にすることを教えるのか？アシュリアンの御子らは、世界を処刑する者でも、罪のない者を殺す者でもないはずだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes grow wide with anger and dismay.{/n} "Does the Path of the Warrior teach you to sacrifice countless lives to achieve your goals? The Children of Asuryan are not the executioners of worlds, nor slayers of the innocent."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは、怒りと落胆で目を見開く。{/n}「戦士の道は、目的を達成するために無数の命を犠牲にすることを教えるのか？アシュリアンの御子らは、世界を処刑する者でも、罪のない者を殺す者でもないはずだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliets Augen weiten sich vor Wut und Bestürzung.{/n} "Lehrt der Pfad des Kriegers Euch, unzählige Leben zu opfern, um Eure Ziele zu erreichen? Die Kinder von Asuryan sind keine Henker von Welten und keine Schlächter von Unschuldigen."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes grow wide with anger and dismay.{/n} "Does the Path of the Warrior teach you to sacrifice countless lives to achieve your goals? The Children of Asuryan are not the executioners of worlds, nor slayers of the innocent."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliets Augen weiten sich vor Wut und Bestürzung.{/n} "Lehrt der Pfad des Kriegers Euch, unzählige Leben zu opfern, um Eure Ziele zu erreichen? Die Kinder von Asuryan sind keine Henker von Welten und keine Schlächter von Unschuldigen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet'in gözleri, öfke ve dehşet içinde kocaman açılıyor.{/n} "Savaşçının Yolu, sana amaçlarına ulaşmak için sayısız canı feda etmeyi mi öğretiyor? Asuryan'ın Çocukları, ne dünyaların celladıdır ne de masumların katili."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes grow wide with anger and dismay.{/n} "Does the Path of the Warrior teach you to sacrifice countless lives to achieve your goals? The Children of Asuryan are not the executioners of worlds, nor slayers of the innocent."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet'in gözleri, öfke ve dehşet içinde kocaman açılıyor.{/n} "Savaşçının Yolu, sana amaçlarına ulaşmak için sayısız canı feda etmeyi mi öğretir? Asuryan'ın Çocukları, dünyaların cellatları da değildir masumların katili de."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
